title: Uncle Tom's Cabin - first paragraph serves to

content.prompt: In the context of the passage, the first paragraph serves primarily to

choices.label: indicate that the narrator is an unsympathetic participant
establish a character that will be contrasted with that of the traveller
celebrate the romance of the American frontier
foreshadow the sinister events about to take place

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
